channel.title: The Best of Steve Jobs' Comments
channel.description: With Apple about to celebrate it's 30th Anniversary, Wired is running a piece on the best Steve Jobs' comments ever. While I don't particularly like the proprietary way in which Apple goes about things - you have to admire the...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description:
I'm not sure "I've always wanted to own and control the primary technology in everything we do." is a *best* comment, but you know (^_^)
My favorite is (actually top right hand corner of my blog) "...it scrolls like butter":
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scrolls_like_butter
item.dc:creator: Ben
